You’re experiencing a new work environment—and a new way of life.
{{company.Company Name:default=Your}}’s customers are, too.
And while we don’t know what’s coming, we still have to plan. That’s why NCR Professional Services team is here. We’d like to take the pressure off and help you re-invent your new normal—virtually.
Need software developers? QA testers? Integration specialists? Solution architects? Done, done and done. We have all of those disciplines and more—and we’re ready to share our virtual expertise:
- ATM/ITM hardware & software - Server infrastructure & channel platforms - Security - Cash management - Image & check processing - Branch transformation - Business and solution integration consulting - Program, project & application management
We know your staff may be limited but still have to complete your strategic projects for 2020—not to mention reimagining your services, infrastructure and customer experience for a post-COVID world.
We have an experienced virtual workforce that we’ve deployed worldwide for 25 years. We can cut time and costs by augmenting your team and delivering contactless consulting you can access today.
How can we help? Please visit us online <[[https://www.ncr.com/global-services/professional-services/professional-services-for-banks]]> or contact NCR <[[https://www.ncr.com/contact-us?path=https://www.ncr.com/banking/atm-self-service/endpoint-security]]> or your local NCR representative to let us know.
